title: Slab Serif ID
content:
Hey all, I'm trying to identify the slab on the "Black & Mild" logo. I saw an empty pack on the ground the other day (the blessing and curse of being a designer: noticing type everywhere) and have been trying to figure out what it uses since then.

I thought the bowl in the "d" was quite peculiar for a slab. Any ideas?

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [BM.png](http://web.archive.org/web/20130821234454/http:/typophile.com/files/BM.png) | 304.35 KB |
author: dannythunder

comments.content:

Alex  
I found it using: [http://www.whatfontis.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20130821234454/http:/www.whatfontis.com/ "http://www.whatfontis.com") - Identify the font you are looking for!
